channel.title: Vladyslav Batyrenko
channel.description: "*I don't have a quote for you (like in the [Ergo theme](https://www.getzola.org/themes/ergo/)), but I'll just say here that it's my personal blog, and it should be mostly about my [Grumpy Visitors](https://github.com/amethyst/grumpy_visitors) game and programming*" - mvlabat, aka Mr. Blyat (not widely really)

item.title: Grumpy Visitors first update. Winter progress
item.description: Though this winter wasn't my the most active season, some interesting updates worth highlighting were merged into master. Mostly the graphics received my attention, so this update will also be rich for screenshots.
